## TimerManager.schedule() method

调度一个一次性或重复的计时器，该计时器将调用已传递的动作

**Signature:**

```typescript
schedule<TContext = unknown>(timeInSeconds: number, repeats: boolean, context: TContext, onTime: (timer: ITimer<TContext>) => void): Timer<TContext>;
```
